modules.name: EO Sum
modules.description:
Sums polyphonic channels and
distributes them to outputs
based on odd / even channel
numbers.

modules.name: Trim LFO Hz
modules.description:
Trims top/bottom values on the selected
LFO output, without attenuating. Quick
access buttons on labels

modules.name: Trim LFO BPM
modules.description:
Trims top/bottom values on the selected
LFO output, without attenuating. Quick
access buttons on labels

modules.name: Polyphonic Mixer
modules.description:
One Cable(s),
4x4 channel Mixer with send/return. Constant
power pan law Aux pre solo/master
post fader

modules.name: Clamp
modules.description:
Feed signal, gained output won't
go over voltages set. Can also
attenuvert signals, Invert
applied to input.

modules.name: Poly X
modules.description:
Merge to polyphonic with mute buttons.

When no input channels are connected
the mute buttons send 1v or 0v, for
use with Level/Pan inputs on Poly Mix.
